Privacy Policy for BMI Calculator App

This Privacy Policy outlines the information that our BMI Calculator app (the "App") collects, uses, and shares about you and how we use that information. By using the App, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy.

Collection of your Personal Information

  • The App does not collect any personal information from you.
  • The App does not access any data on your device such as contacts, location, or camera.

Use of your Personal Information

  • The App does not use any personal information for any purpose.
  • The App does not share any personal information with any third party.
  • The information you input into the App, such as your height and weight, is used solely for the purpose of calculating your Body Mass Index (BMI).
  • The App does not share or sell any of the information you input to any third party.

Security:

  • We take reasonable measures to protect the information you input into the App from unauthorized access and use.
  • The App does not store any of the information you input into the App.

Changes to this Privacy Policy

  • We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
  • You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
